com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj

Class ComponentAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert
  • Deprecated. 
    Use LithoAssertions which provides entry points to all Litho AssertJ helpers.

    @Deprecated
public final class ComponentAssert
extends <any>
    Assertion methods for Components.

    To create an instance of this class, invoke assertThat(ComponentContext, Component) or assertThat(Component.Builder).

                                         Component component)
        Deprecated. 

      • assertThat

        public static ComponentAssert assertThat(Component.Builder<?> builder)
        Deprecated. 

      • afterStateUpdate

        @Deprecated
public LithoViewAssert afterStateUpdate()
        Deprecated. 
        Avoid using this method, as an alternative, try invoking the code that causes the real state update in your test.

        For more details see withStateUpdate(StateUpdatesTestHelper.StateUpdater)

      • withStateUpdate

        @Deprecated
public LithoViewAssert withStateUpdate(StateUpdatesTestHelper.StateUpdater updater)
        Deprecated. 
        Avoid using this method. It lets you modify the state of a component in a different code path than the one used in production

        As an alternative, try invoking the code that causes the real state update in your test.

        For example, if your component updates the state to hide a piece of text once clicked, instead of calling that same test update, use InteractionUtil to fake a click on the component, which will cause the state update (and other effects that could be tested perhaps)

        If you are unable to solve your problem that way, use this method as a last resort. This would be similar to cases when one resorts to reflection to make a test work. Ugly, but needed in rare cases.

      • hasNoSubComponents

public ComponentAssert hasNoSubComponents()
        Deprecated. Use extractingSubComponents(com.facebook.litho.ComponentContext) instead.
        Assert that the given component has no sub-components.

      • extracting

        public <A> <any> extracting(<any> extractor)
        Deprecated. 
        Extract values from the underlying component based on the Extractor provided.
        Type Parameters:
        A - Type of the value extracted.
        Parameters:
        extractor - The extractor applied to the Component.
        Returns:
        ListAssert for the extracted values.

      • wontRender

        @Deprecated
public ComponentAssert wontRender()
        Deprecated. Use LithoViewAssert.willNotRenderContent() ()} that will check if the root component will return null or a child with width oir height equal to 0
        Assert that a given Component renders to null, i.e. its onCreateLayout returns null.

      • willRender

        @Deprecated
public ComponentAssert willRender()
        Deprecated. Use LithoViewAssert.willRenderContent() that will check if the root component won't return null or a child with height and width equal to 0
        Assert that a given Component produces a non-null layout.
